15/*! \file */
16
17#ifndef RNDC_OS_H
18#define RNDC_OS_H 1
19
20#include <isc/lang.h>
21#include <stdio.h>
22
23ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
24
25int set_user(FILE *fd, const char *user);
26/*%<
27 * Set the owner of the file referenced by 'fd' to 'user'.
28 * Returns:
29 * 0 success
30 * -1 insufficient permissions, or 'user' does not exist.
31 */
32
33ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
34
35#endif
